description: Members of the far-right group gave out books that appear to caricature Turkish men brandishing guns.
title: German far-right AfD accused of handing out 'racist' colouring book
title_page: German far-right AfD accused of handing out 'racist' colouring book - BBC News
maintext: The vote was described as a political earthquake as it was the first time the AfD had helped to form a state government in Germany, breaking a consensus among the main parties never to work with extremist parties.
